messages.title: Straight talking.
messages.content: My public service has included 14 years as a Washington parish councillor. In 2004 I joined UKIP, and the local branch committee. I have stood twice in local elections, and I am currently the UKIP West Sussex County Organiser (www.ukipwsx.org), and editor of the UKIP West Sussex newspaper. You will also find me on Facebook. In the coming months we have much work to do as a party, on which to secure decisions for our country. I shall devote my energy towards electing, informing and listening to the electors of West Worthing.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A focus on investigating previous examples of local government's attempt to acquire what has been considered as Common Land.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Support for small businesses and the retail trade
keyPolicies.policyDescription: A proposal to stimulate local industry by addressing the disconnect between local government and the reality of businesses, as well as to reduce car parking charges in town centres between the hours of 9-11am in order to stimulate local retail trade.

issues.economy: A proposal to stimulate local industry by reducing car parking charges in town centres.
issues.governance: Investigating the apparent abuse by local councils in the context of Common Land.

leaflet.personalStatement: I shall devote my energy towards electing, informing and listening to the electors of West Worthing.

politicalExperience.role: Editor of the UKIP West Sussex newspaper
